definitions.meaning: 鉴 于，考虑到；由于；在⋯⋯能看见的范围内

examples.content:
She fell into the grass in full view of the Triceratops!
她跌倒在草地上，完完全全地暴露在三角龙的视野之下。

Well, in view of what's happened
鉴于现在发生的事

Thanks, but in view of the general responses, you and I are definitely in the minority.
谢谢，但是鉴于大众的回应，你和我绝对占少数。
